sentences.sentence: Abramovich, however, is aware of the charge and had an answer ready: 'People who know me said I will win one or two Premierships and will not be interested after that.
sentences.translation: 然而阿布已经意识到这样的控诉，并以此回应：“那些认识我的人曾说过，在赢了一两次联赛冠军之后我就不会对这个感兴趣了。”

sentences.sentence: If he leaves for a huge sum or stays another 3,5 years, his contract, before he leaves I for one will send him off as a Chelsea hero for what he has given us. Among that two premierships.
sentences.translation: 即使他离开我们，我也一样认为他是切尔西的英雄，就因为他在切尔西三年半时间里给我们带来的每一场精彩的比赛，甚至包括我怀疑他的那两年。
